blurb: A programming language explicitly designed to introduce students to computer science, Pyret plays a central role in 'A Data-Centric Introduction to Computing', an introductory college textbook, and is currently being taught in U.S. high schools

key_features.title: Simplified syntax
key_features.content: As a teaching language, Pyret prioritizes readability using clean and straight-forward syntax

key_features.title: Pedagogical design
key_features.content: Pyret was explicitly designed for a gradual learning curve, focusing on general programming practices

key_features.title: Innovative
key_features.content: Pyret is an actively-developed testbed for pedagogy in high school and college computer science.
